original_text: But some people do not live in these good ways. They do not think that these things are important. They are like blind people. They cannot really see anything properly. They have forgotten that God has made them clean from all the sins that they did in past times.
korean_text: 이런 것이 없는 자는 맹인이라 멀리 보지 못하고 그의 옛 죄가 깨끗하게 된 것을 잊었느니라

sentences.original_text: But some people do not live in these good ways
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 어떤 사람들은 이 좋은 방식으로 살지 않습니다

sentences.original_text: They do not think that these things are important
They cannot really see anything properly
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 정말로 아무것도 제대로 볼 수 없습니다

sentences.original_text: that God has made them clean from all the sins
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 그들을 모든 죄로부터 깨끗하게 하셨다는 것을

sentences.original_text: that they did in past times
